a.title: Follow this site and get back to it easily from your sites page.

br.div:
Merced County school districts have suspended in-class instruction for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year and transitioned to distance learning. Click on the links below for information and resources.
Los distritos escolares del condado de Merced han suspendido la instrucción en clase durante el resto del año escolar 2019-20 y han pasado a la educación a distancia. Haga clic en los enlaces a continuación para obtener información y recursos.​ ​COVID-1​​9 County Resources​​​​

a.title: COVID-19 County Resources

span.span: CDC And Merced County Dept of Health
Recursos en el Condado para COVID-19

div.p: ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​To prevent the spread of COVID-19, the Merced County Office of Education, in collaboration with the 20 school districts in the county, ​have suspended in-class instruction for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year and transitioned to distance learning. We understand how difficult this is for our students, families and school communities.
​​Below are resources from MCOE and school districts identifying educational resources and student meal locations during this temporary school closure.​
div.div:
​
​
​​​​Merced Count​y Meals Distribu​tion Sit​es
Schedules and meal-types vary by site.
Instructions​:
Open the map​ and click​ th​e Search button
Search for your address to find nearby meal distribution sites.
Select the meal distribution site and click the Direction button.
Find the directions to the meal distribution sites on Google Maps.​​
​​

address.p:
MERCED COUNTY OFFICE OF EDUCATION
632 West 13th Street
Merced, CA 95341
(209) 381-6600
